comments:
I haven't been able to figure out a general way to reproduce this, other than
the following:

In my workspace, I have two java projects one called A and B.
I also have two EJB project with EJB client jars called ARGClient and EJB2Client.
These 4 projects show up in the web libs preference page for my WEB project.  If
I first select them all and hit OK, they all seem to be added correctly.  The
next time I bring up the dialog, if I unselect the 2 ejb clients and then hit
apply and then OK, the following null pointer occcurs during the final OK.
